name: namaste-node
description: - is asynchronous non blocking I/O reading and writing files - Non blocking I/O coz it won't block the main thread that means main execution is going on in v8's call stack and other io operations are happening in libuv - Node.js is a cross-platform, open-source JavaScript runtime environment that can run on Windows, Linux, Unix, macOS, and more. Node.js runs on the V8 JavaScript engine, and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
